All Implemented Interfaces:
SiteTreeNodeVisitor
public class DeleteRCTask
extends TwoDocumentsOperationTask

Ant task to delete the rcml- and backup files of documents corresponding to a defined subtree (Visitor pattern) Visitor of the subtree. The subtree is reverse visited.
